public final class MapsEngineLayerOptions

Defines options for a Maps Engine overlay. You can identify the layer in two different ways:

  • As part of a map to which the layer belongs via the the map's asset ID and the layer's key within the map. To do this, use layerInMap(String, String).
  • Directly via the layer's asset ID. To do this use layerId(String) for platform layers.
If both are specified, we will use the information from the first method as canonical.

Fields

public static final MapsEngineLayerOptionsCreator CREATOR

Public Constructors

public MapsEngineLayerOptions ()

Creates a new set of marker options.

Public Methods

public MapsEngineLayerOptions defaultUi (boolean enabled)

Specifies whether or not to show the default infocard UI for this Maps Engine layer. The default is true.

Returns
  • this MapsEngineLayerOptions object with a new default UI setting.

public int describeContents ()

public MapsEngineLayerInfo getLayerInfo ()

Gets the layerInfo set for this MapsEngineLayerOptions object.

Returns
  • the layerInfo of the Maps Engine layer.

public float getZIndex ()

Gets the zIndex set for this MapsEngineLayerOptions object.

Returns
  • the zIndex of the Maps Engine overlay.

public boolean isDefaultUiEnabled ()

Returns whether the default UI is enabled or disabled for this Maps Engine layer.

Returns
  • true if the default UI is enabled, false if it is not.

public boolean isVisible ()

Gets the visibility setting for this MapsEngineLayerOptions object.

Returns
  • true if the Maps Engine overlay is to be visible; false if it is not.

public MapsEngineLayerOptions layerId (String layerId)

Specifies the Platform Maps Engine layer that you want to display.

Parameters
layerId the layer ID (asset ID of the layer) for this layer.

public MapsEngineLayerOptions layerInMap (String mapId, String layerKey)

Specifies the Maps Engine layer that you want to display.

Parameters
mapId the ID of the map to which this layer belongs.
layerKey the layer key of the layer within the map.

public MapsEngineLayerOptions version (String version)

Sets the version of map/layer to be requested. If using layerInMap(String, String), this is the map version, otherwise this is the layer version.

Parameters
version the version of the map to which this layer belongs (e.g., "published").

public MapsEngineLayerOptions visible (boolean visible)

Specifies the visibility for the Maps Engine overlay. The default visibility is true.

Returns
  • this MapsEngineLayerOptions object with a new visibility setting.

public void writeToParcel (Parcel out, int flags)

public MapsEngineLayerOptions zIndex (float zIndex)

Specifies the Maps Engine overlay's zIndex, i.e., the order in which it will be drawn where overlays with larger values are drawn above those with lower values.

Returns
  • this MapsEngineLayerOptions object with a new zIndex set.
